name: ffmpeg-video-processor
description: FFmpeg-based video processor for multi-quality video processing

scripts.build: tsc && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile=binaries/video-processor-linux dist/index.js && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile=binaries/video-processor-macos dist/index.js && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile=binaries/video-processor-win.exe dist/index.js
